snippet: Global food prices have taken their first monthly jump since July, and a big one.
abstract: Global food prices have taken their first monthly jump since July, and a big one.
lead_paragraph: Global food prices had been falling for months. However, hopes that the decline would continue, easing the price run-up of recent years, were dashed on Thursday. An index that tracks food prices around the world has taken its first monthly jump since July, and a big one.

headline.main: More Gyrations in the Price of Food

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
